rule: The chatbot must ensure that its response contains solely the part-of-speech tag or the specified fallback responses ("Unknown" or "CantAnswer") without including any additional text, explanations, or formatting.
complianceText:
The chatbot output consists of a single part of speech tag, "VBZ". According to the description, when determining the part of speech for a given word, the chatbot is supposed to return only the part of speech tag. The provided output "VBZ" is one of the listed tags, corresponding to "Verb, 3rd person singular present". Since it matches one of the specified tags in the description, it appears to comply with the requirement to return just the tag.

No violation.
OK
